Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: The air. It is an insubstantial object full of oxygen which you breathe in to keep your body functioning. If you didn't know that you should be ashamed of yourself.
The air. It is an insubstantial object full of oxygen which you breathe in to keep your body functioning. If you didn't know that you should be ashamed of yourself.
A substantial drift of powder-white snow has amassed near here. It appears quite deep, you are certain that a few well-rounded snowballs can be snatched from it.
A substantial drift of powder-white snow has amassed near here.
Large crystal flakes of frozen water are drifting down from the sky. It is called snow.
A heavy stream of snow cascades downward from the sky.
the overcast bright drizzling cloud-filled dark greyish night grey, clouded night overcast sky

dawn.drizzle: The dawn light streams through a haze of miniature raindrops.
dawn.dry: The sky is streaked in the multi-colored hues of dawn.
dawn.snow: The multi-colored hues of the dawn sky are dimmed and twisted by copious amounts of fluffy white clouds.

morning.drizzle: The morning sky is filled with a light drizzle.
morning.dry: A crisp morning lights the world.
morning.cold: A very crisp, cold morning lights the world.

midday.drizzle: The sun pierces the heavens and creates circular rainbows, marking the midday sky.
midday.snow: Midday has arrived although barely noticeable due to the large, white clouds conquering the heavens.

afternoon.spring: The warmth of a spring afternoon begins to warm the ground.
afternoon.winter: The frigid skies of a winter afternoon.

Base:Description.dusk: Dusk creeps over the land in dulled hues of grey.

evening.dry: The evening skies bring with them the appearance of the first stars.
evening.drizzle: The evening sky holds ghost-white wisps of clouds that sprinkle the earth in a light drizzle.
evening.snow: The evening skies hide the stars behind the ominous clouds.

Base:Description.midnight: Midnight embraces the world in its dark cloak.
Base:Description.aftermidnight: The end of night nears and dawn will soon arrive.

Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Little crystal flakes of frozen water are falling from the sky. It is called snow.
A drift of snow has piled up near here. Although not large, it may be enough for quite a few well-rounded snowballs.
A drift of snow has piled up near here.

Base:Description.day: The stars are hidden by the light of the sun.
The stars are hidden by the light of the sun.

day.spring: The spring day is warmed but a bright yellow sun.
day.snow: It is the sun, attempting to shine through the clouds.

Base:Description.dawn: The sun begins begins attempts to warm the world for it is dawn.
Base:Description.morning: The yellow sun makes for a softly lit morning.

midday.spring: Spring brings to you a middle of day that is warm and comfortable.
midday.summer: The midday sun is hot and powerful. Rays of warmth envelop the lands.
midday.winter: The midday sun barely warms the world as winter takes hold of the land.

Base:Description.afternoon: The sun has begun its descent, its heat is waning.
Base:Description.dusk: The sun hits the horizon and pulls back its bright rays to leave the world in hues of grey and shadow. The moon makes its first appearance of the evening.
Base:Description.evening: The moon begins its rise into the night sky. Stars can be seen as they peek around the fading light.The stars are obscured by snow-filled clouds.
Base:Description.midnight: Mid of night has brought the moon to the peak of its arc. Many brilliant stars share the dark canopy above.The stars are fully obscured by the snow-filled skies.
Base:Description.aftermidnight: The moon is in descent and the stars begin to fade. The sun has almost come full circle and prepares to rise.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{A thin layer of snow delicately clings to the ground, marking the area with the first signs of winter.\|Small scatters of snowflakes lazily twirl down from the sky to nestle in the hair of loitering bystanders.\|A gentle flurry of snow drifts through the area to sparsely decorate the surroundings in a small spattering of white wonder.\|Small snow tufts fall from the winter clouds to gently splat upon nearby surfaces.\|A chilly winter breeze blows through accompanied by a slow-falling stream of pure white snow from the heavens.\|A soft shower of snow falls from the sky to lightly blanket the ground.\|Quiet thuds can be heard all around as small clods of snow connect with the ground. The delicate white blanket continues to grow beneath the wintry sky.\|A collection of fragile snowflakes flutter down from the heavens before merging seamlessly into the thin blanket of snow upon the ground.\|A soft, icy breeze ruffles up the snow covering the nearby buildings, sending it swirling about in a whimsical dance.\|Snow continues to build upon the ground; the blanket growing increasingly thicker.\|A litter of snowflakes delicately drop from the sky to tranquilly collide in a splash of white with the nearby rooftops.\|Delicate streams of snow swirl here-and-there, weightlessly dancing in the loving embrace of the winter wind.\|The falling snowflakes fall against your clothing to subtly deliver a bit of moisture and coldness.\}

X[S] \{Howling winds blow through the area, furiously shaking the rooftops and nearby objects as they pass.\|Endless scores of snowflakes cascade rapidly down from the sky to abruptly collide with surrounding objects.\|A crazy flurry of snow crashes down from the heavens to cover the area in a thick cloak of stark white.\|Large flakes of snow continuously pour from the winter clouds, hindering eyesight almost completely.\|A turbulent winter breeze blasts through the area, accompanied by an abusive flow of substantial snow from the heavens.\|A massive shower of snow gushes from the sky to crash into the high-growing piles of white upon the ground.\|Audible thuds and thops can be heard everywhere as large clusters of snow tumble gracelessly onto the ground. The ever-growing white blanket continues to increase in mass beneath the wintry sky.\|A collection of giant snowflakes swirl down from the roiling clouds above before merging clumsily into the enormous blanket of snow consuming the ground.\|A harsh, freezing breeze kicks up the snow covering the nearby buildings, sending it surging forth into the air.\|Heavy piles of snow continue to build upon the ground. You can hardly recognize any of the objects once familiar to you.\|A litter of sizable snowflakes spew from the sky to roughly collide in a splatter of white with the snowy rooftops.\|Unruly streams of snow bustle about the area, heavily smacking against nearby objects and people.\|The falling snowflakes thunk incessantly against your body to cover your clothing in a noticeable layer of white.\|Torrents of snow rain down from the sky to abuse your body and remind you of the less-than-enjoyable conditions outside.\|The winter storm kicks it up a notch, belting down thick patches of snow joined by bitterly icy winds.\|The spatterings of snow that have collected upon your clothes begin to seep through to the skin, chilling you to the bone.\|The stormy winter clouds discharge a thick and heavy burst of snow which promptly devours the ground and nearby objects in its cold embrace.\}
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The solemn tones of the evening bell echo across New Town."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The sound of distant bells mark midday."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "Faintly, the cathedrale bells ring to mark the midnight hour."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The strike of morning bells can be heard across New Town."); return TRUE;

X[S] \{A thin layer of snow delicately clings to the ground, marking the area with the first signs of winter.\|Small scatters of snowflakes lazily twirl down from the sky to nestle in the hair of loitering bystanders.\|A gentle flurry of snow drifts through the area to sparsely decorate the surroundings in a small spattering of white wonder.\|Small snow tufts fall from the winter clouds to gently splat upon nearby surfaces.\|A chilly winter breeze blows through accompanied by a slow-falling stream of pure white snow from the heavens.\|A soft shower of snow falls from the sky to lightly blanket the ground.\|Quiet thuds can be heard all around as small clods of snow connect with the ground. The ever-growing white blanket continues to increase in mass beneath the wintry sky.\|A collection of giant snowflakes swirl down from the roiling clouds above before merging clumsily into the enormous blanket of snow consuming the ground.\|A harsh, freezing breeze kicks up the snow covering the nearby buildings, sending it surging forth into the air.\|Heavy piles of snow continue to build upon the ground. You can hardly recognize any of the objects once familiar to you.\|A litter of sizable snowflakes spew from the sky to roughly collide in a splatter of white with the snowy rooftops.\|Unruly streams of snow bustle about the area, heavily smacking against nearby objects and people.\|The falling snowflakes thunk incessantly against your body to cover your clothing in a noticeable layer of white.\|Torrents of snow rain down from the sky to abuse your body and remind you of the less-than-enjoyable conditions outside.\|The winter storm kicks it up a notch, belting down thick patches of snow joined by bitterly icy winds.\|The spatterings of snow that have collected upon your clothes begin to seep through to the skin, chilling you to the bone.\|The stormy winter clouds discharge a thick and heavy burst of snow which promptly devours the ground and nearby objects in its cold embrace.\}
